meanings.definition: Relating to the art or practice of preparing, stuffing, and mounting the skins of animals for display.
meanings.sent1: The taxidermic display in the museum showcased various animals in lifelike poses.
meanings.sent2: The taxidermic process involves carefully preserving the animal skins for exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The taxidermic squirrel in the shop window seemed to be waving at passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her taxidermic skills were so precise that the animals looked as if they could come to life.
meanings.sent5: The taxidermic artistry captured the essence of each animal with remarkable detail.

meanings.sent1: The taxidermic tools used by the taxidermist were essential for the job.
meanings.sent2: She admired the taxidermic workmanship of the mounted deer head on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The taxidermic class was full of students eager to learn the craft.
meanings.sent4: His taxidermic expertise made him a sought-after professional in the field.
meanings.sent5: The taxidermic techniques employed by the artist were truly impressive.
